subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[徑]]}} ''(Orthodox {{w|Traditional Chinese|traditional form}} of ''<big>逕</big>'' in mainland China)''
* <font size=4, lang=zh-Hans>[[径#Translingual|径]]</font> ''({{w|Simplified Chinese|Simplified}} form of ''<big>逕</big>'' and {{l|mul|徑}} in mainland China)''
* {{l|mul|[[迳]]}} ''({{w|Simplified Chinese|Simplified}} form of ''<big>逕</big>'' only used for placenames and personal names in mainland China)''
